title: The Disappearing Polish S
content:
This article, about a web site that had a problem for its Polish users,

[https://medium.com/medium-eng/the-curious-case-of-disappearing-polish-s-fa398313d4df](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140304/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fmedium.com/medium-eng/the-curious-case-of-disappearing-polish-s-fa398313d4df)

may be of interest to users of this forum, although it's more about computers than type.
author: quadibloc

comments.content: Have you tried the link? It does not work for me.
Ah; the link failed not because I used the wrong one, but because of a bug in the forum software causing links in the initial post of a thread to go to the wiki instead!
Looks like regular HTTP links do not tickle that bug.
